snippet: Zimbabwe’s highest court threw out a legal challenge by the main opposition party charging that the July 31 elections won by President Robert Mugabe were marred by fraud.
abstract: Zimbabwe's highest court throws out legal challenge by main opposition party charging that July 31 elections won by President Robert Mugabe were marred by fraud.
lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe’s highest court threw out a legal challenge by the main opposition party charging that the July 31 elections won by President Robert Mugabe were marred by fraud.

headline.main: Zimbabwe: Rejecting Fraud Claims, Court Upholds Presidential Election
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe: Rejecting Fraud Claims, Court Upholds Presidential Election
